org.ensembl.driver
Interface TranscriptAdaptor

All Superinterfaces:
Adaptor, FeatureAdaptor, java.rmi.Remote
public interface TranscriptAdaptor
extends FeatureAdaptor

Provides access to Transcripts in the datasource.

Field Summary
static java.lang.String TYPE
          Name of the default TranscriptAdaptor available from a driver.
 
Method Summary
 void delete(long transcriptInternalID)
          Deletes transcript with specified internalID plus it's exons and translation from persistent storage.

fetchComplete

public Transcript fetchComplete(Transcript transcript)
                         throws AdaptorException
Loads missing gene and exons into the transcript where these are available in the database.

Returns:
transcript with exons and gene set where possible.
Throws:
AdaptorException

fetchByGeneIDs

public java.util.List fetchByGeneIDs(long[] geneIDs)
                              throws AdaptorException
Get all the transcripts associated with the specified genes.

Parameters:
geneIDs - internal IDs of genes.
Returns:
A list of all the transcripts for that genes in no partticular order.
Throws:
AdaptorException
See Also:
fetchByGeneIDs(long[], boolean)

fetchByGeneIDs

public java.util.List fetchByGeneIDs(long[] geneIDs,
                                     boolean loadChildren)
                              throws AdaptorException
Get all the transcripts associated with the specified genes and optionally preload the child transcripts, translations and exons.

Parameters:
geneIDs - internal IDs of genes.
Returns:
A list of all the transcripts for that genes in no partticular order.
Throws:
AdaptorException

                                 throws AdaptorException

fetchAccessionID

public void fetchAccessionID(Transcript transcript)
                      throws AdaptorException
Retrieves transcript's accession from persistent store and sets transcript.accession.

Throws:
AdaptorException

fetchVersion

public void fetchVersion(Transcript transcript)
                  throws AdaptorException
Retrieves transcript's version from persistent store and sets transcript.version. Version is set to 0 if it is unavailable in persistent store.

Parameters:
transcript - transcript.internalID should be >0
Throws:
AdaptorException

fetchSupportingFeatures

public java.util.List fetchSupportingFeatures(long transcriptID)
                                       throws AdaptorException
Returns supporting features for this transcript.

Parameters:
transcriptID - internal ID of the transcript of interest.
Returns:
zero or more supporting features where a supporting feature is either a DnaDnaAlignment or a DnaProteinAlignment.
Throws:
AdaptorException
See Also:
DnaDnaAlignment, DnaProteinAlignment
